search_results.title: Remembering Chezi
search_results.snippet: Chezi Goldberg z"l, who was murdered in last week's Jerusalem bus bombing, cared and took responsibility for others. He was a true disciple of Moses.

search_results.title: Yechezkel Chezi Goldberg | Author at Aish.com
search_results.snippet: Chezi Goldberg, a 42-year-old father of seven originally from Toronto, was killed in the Jerusalem bus bombing on January 29, 2004.

search_results.title: Yechezkel Chezi Goldberg
search_results.snippet: Yechezkel Chezi Goldberg, a Jerusalem-based counselor for adolescents and families at risk, wrote the following essay in 2001. On Jan. 29, Goldberg was murdered ...
